title: Nvidia becomes first publicly listed company with $US4 trillion valuation
description: Amid an investor frenzy around artificial intelligence, the valuation for Silicon Valley chipmaker Nvidia reaches $US4 trillion ($6.12 trillion).
content:
Silicon Valley chipmaker Nvidia has become the first publicly traded company to surpass a $US4 trillion ($6.12 trillion) market valuation.
It puts the latest exclamation point on the investor frenzy surrounding an artificial intelligence boom powered... [3208 chars]

title: Musk's AI company scrubs inappropriate posts after Grok chatbot makes antisemitic comments
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company said Wednesday that it's taking down “inappropriate posts" made by its Grok chatbot , which appeared to include antisemitic comments that praised Adolf Hitler.
content:

title: Musk's AI firm deletes Grok posts praising Hitler as X CEO Linda Yaccarino resigns
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence firm has deleted "inappropriate" antisemitic and pro-Hitler Grok posts, as Türkiye and Poland cracked down on the chatbot for offensive comments.
content:
